summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Pike Paza Redevelopment Project (No. Wash. R-17), authorizing a loan and grant contract with the United States of America for financial assistance in carrying out said project, creating the "Project Expenditures Fund; Project No. Wash. R-17" and the "Project Temporary Loan Repayment Fund; Project No. Wash. R-17", and superseding Ordinance 100161.
